translations: （法）变速器；装有变速器的自行车

sentences.sentence: You can start with the fork then look at the wheels and rear derailleur.
sentences.translation: 你可以开始与叉然后再看看后面的车轮和变速器。

sentences.sentence: You could dump the bike on the right side with no damage to the derailleur.
sentences.translation: 你可以倒在右侧的自行车，没有对变速器损坏。

sentences.sentence: I said much the same thing in my derailleur articles in "Bicycling" magazine.
sentences.translation: 我在变速器的文章同样的事情在“骑脚踏车”杂志。
